meanings.sent1: Appendicitis can cause severe stomach pain.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with appendicitis after the examination.
meanings.sent3: When the appendix gets angry, it leads to appendicitis.
meanings.sent4: Her inflamed appendix felt like a ticking time bomb of appendicitis.
meanings.sent5: The sharp pain of appendicitis made her rush to the hospital.

meanings.definition: A medical condition characterized by pain in the lower right abdomen.
meanings.sent1: The sharp pain in his lower right abdomen indicated appendicitis.
meanings.sent2: She was hospitalized due to severe appendicitis pain.
meanings.sent3: His lower right abdomen felt like a grumpy bear with appendicitis.
meanings.sent4: The pain of appendicitis was like a relentless drumbeat in his abdomen.
meanings.sent5: The throbbing ache of appendicitis made it hard for her to move.
